Articles.Content:
The ghostbusters come and... er... shoot plasma at you!

My ash remains of Megatiger.

I blow away the ash with an electric fan, pour a drink and sit by the pool.

My patio!

I come and sit on the patio as well.

Me and Xorth Tanovar's patio.

\*nuke\*

My desolated wasteland.

I build a hill on the desolated wasteland and plant my flag there.

My hill on the desolated wasteland!

I conga.

My conga planet.

I reemerge from nowhere and claim the hill with a Fusion Cannon.

My hill surrounded by a conga planet.

All conga is eliminated.

My planet.

I colonize a planet, and make a forcefield around it. (boosted with a hype generator and set to a frequency to destroy space marines and ponies along with their ships most effectively)

My planet. (I abandon the 2 other hills)
xcom and BIONICLES were not listed so I find some xcom under a bush and put them with my bionicles. my anti-forcefield division about to claim a planet and 2 hills.

All xcom and bionicles forces are expelled by a laser grid 30km from the ground.

My megatiger-proof planet.

I delete planet.exe

My recycle bin.

I create a new "hill.exe" file and reboot the hill.

My hill.

I conquer the hill with an army of conga dudes.

My hill of conga, which is being carried off into the sunset by millions of conga dudes.

I ban all conga and conga people from existence.

My hill.

I murder Sun for liking mud.

My fascist genocide.

I bring in a giant blimp and fire a laser through you with... BLIMP MOUNTED LAZORS!

My blinded mud-liker-killer.

I tear out my eyes and plug in bionic ones, restoring me to normality.

Myself.

The blimp comes back and melts your optics-processing area of your brain using photons.

My well-defended area that extends to the horizon.

I modify some physical constants which cause the helium in your blimps to decay into hydrogen. The reduction in density causes them to swell up and rise into the upper atmosphere where they rip open. The hydrogen comes into contact with the engines, resulting in boom. I return the physical constants back to normal and grab the smoldering blimp wreckage, which I fly off with.

My blimp wreckage.

Meanwhile, a small fraction of every existing star explodes.

Somehow a dove the size of a small aircraft came out of this radiation fest and grabs GreeningGalaxy by the leg. It drags GreeningGalaxy back to space, where galaxies belong. Also, the small reduction in stars does 0.6 damage to GreeningGalaxy.

My planet.

I take ogre the planet.

My Shrek planet.

I send in the [Predators](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Predator_%28alien%29).

My Predator planet.

I flood their planet with burning rotten sulpheric acid, carbon dioxide gas, heat, and pressure.

My Venus.

I destroy your Venus with a planet buster.

Then I found another planet.

My planet.
